parameters.query:
SELECT
  m.id AS module_id,
  mt_source.content AS module_content_source,
  COALESCE(json_agg(
    json_build_object(
      'lesson_id', l.id,
      'lesson_content_source', lt_source.content,
      'position', l.position
    )
    ORDER BY l.position NULLS LAST, l.id
  ) FILTER (WHERE lt_source.content IS NOT NULL), '[]'::json) AS lessons
FROM modules m
JOIN courses c ON c.id = m.course_id
JOIN module_translations mt_source
  ON mt_source.module_id = m.id AND mt_source.language_code = '{{ $json.body.source_language }}'
JOIN lessons l
  ON l.module_id = m.id
JOIN lesson_translations lt_source
  ON lt_source.lesson_id = l.id AND lt_source.language_code = '{{ $json.body.source_language }}'
LEFT JOIN lesson_translations lt_target
  ON lt_target.lesson_id = l.id AND lt_target.language_code = '{{ $json.body.target_language }}'
WHERE c.id = '{{ $json.body.course_id }}'
  AND lt_target.lesson_id IS NULL
GROUP BY m.id, mt_source.content;

SELECT
  mt_source.module_id,
  mt_source.content AS module_content_source
FROM module_translations mt_source
JOIN modules m ON m.id = mt_source.module_id
JOIN courses c ON c.id = m.course_id
LEFT JOIN module_translations mt_target
  ON mt_target.module_id = mt_source.module_id AND mt_target.language_code = '{{ $json.body.target_language }}'
WHERE mt_source.language_code = '{{ $json.body.source_language }}'
  AND c.id = '{{ $json.body.course_id }}'
  AND mt_target.module_id IS NULL;
